src_original: evam apy ahaṃ na vadāmi /  NidSa 20.13d dasatsu ca pratyayeṣu duḥkhāni santīti yasyaivaṃ syād asvayaṃkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṃ duḥkham  evam ahaṃ na vadāmi /
tgt_original: 若受自受、受他受復與苦者，如是者自他作，我亦不說； 若不因自、他，無因而生苦者，我亦不說。

src_original: NidSa 20.14 ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya madhyamayā pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 離此諸邊，說其中道。

src_original: yad utāsmin satīdaṃ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate pūrvavad yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 如來說法此有故彼有，此起故彼起； 謂緣無明行乃至純大苦聚集，無明滅則行滅，乃至純大苦聚滅。

src_original: NidSa 20.15 asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe 'celakāśyapasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam /
tgt_original: 」佛說此經已，阿支羅迦葉遠塵離垢，得法眼淨。

src_original: NidSa 20.16 athācelakāśyapo dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā  tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpto  yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 時，阿支羅迦葉見法得法，知法入法，度諸狐疑，不由他知，不因他度，於正法律，心得無畏，合掌白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 20.17 abhikkrānto 'haṃ bhadanta abhikkrāntaḥ /  eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /  upāsākaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 我今已度，我從今日歸依佛、歸依法、歸依僧，盡形壽作優婆塞，證知我。

src_original: NidSa 20.18 athācelakāśyapo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
tgt_original: 」阿支羅迦葉聞佛所說，歡喜隨喜，作禮而去。

src_original: NidSa 20.19 athācelakāśyapo 'ciraprakrānto bhagavato 'ntikād gavā taruṇavatsayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ /  tasya maraṇasamaye viprasannānīndriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavarṇaḥ paryavadātas tvagvarṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 時，阿支羅迦葉辭世尊去，不久為護犢牸牛所觸殺，於命終時，諸根清淨，顏色鮮白。

src_original: NidSa 20.20 atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśan /  aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ /
tgt_original: 爾時，世尊入城乞食。

src_original: yo 'sāv acelakāśyapo bhagavantaṃ rājagṛhe praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavān so 'ciraprakrānto bhagavato 'ntikād gavā taruṇavatsayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ /  tasya maraṇasamaye viprasannānīndriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavarṇaḥ paryavadātas tvagvarṇaḥ /  NidSa 20.21 śrutvā ca punā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātaṃ pratikrāntāḥ /
tgt_original: 時有眾多比丘，亦入王舍城乞食，聞有傳說阿支羅迦葉從世尊聞法，辭去不久，為牛所觸殺，於命終時，諸根清淨，顏色鮮白。

src_original: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagmuḥ /  upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdan /
tgt_original: 諸比丘乞食已還出，舉衣鉢洗足，詣世尊所，稽首禮足，退座一面，白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 20.2 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatād avatīrṇo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
tgt_original: 世尊晨朝著衣持鉢，出耆闍崛山，入王舍城乞食。

src_original: NidSa 20.3 tena khalu samayenācelakāśyapo rājagṛhaṃ gocarāya prasṛto 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena /  adrākṣīd acelakāśyapo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva /
tgt_original: 時有阿支羅迦葉，為營小事，出王舍城，向耆闍崛山。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma /  upetya bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 遙見世尊，見已詣佛所，白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 20.4 pṛcchāma bho gautama kañcid eva pradeśam /  saced avakāśaṃ kuryāt praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 「瞿曇！ 欲有所問，寧有閑暇見答與不？

src_original: NidSa 20.5 akālas tāvat tava kāśyapa praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉：

src_original: rājagṛhaṃ tāvat piṇḍāya caritavyam /  bahir ārāmaṃ gaccha /  tatra te kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 「今非論時，我今入城乞食，來還則是其時，當為汝說。

src_original: NidSa 20.6 dvir apy evam eva vācyam /  NidSa 20.7 trir apy acelakāśyapo bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 」第二亦如是說，第三復問： 「瞿曇！ 何為我作留難？

src_original: syād bho gautamāsmākaṃ vāntarāyo bhavati gautamasyānyathātvam /  ihaiva vayaṃ bhavantaṃ gautamaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 瞿曇！ 云何有異？ 我今欲有所問，為我解說。

src_original: saced avakāśaṃ kuryāḥ praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /  NidSa 20.8 pṛccha kāśyapa yad yad evākāṅkṣase /
tgt_original: 」佛告阿支羅迦葉： 「隨汝所問。 」阿支羅迦葉白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 20.9a kin nu bho gautama svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「云何——瞿曇！ ——苦自作耶？

src_original: avyākṛtam idaṃ mayā kāśyapa svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「苦自作者，此是無記。 」迦葉復問：

src_original: NidSa 20.9b kin nu bho gautama parakṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「云何——瞿曇！ ——苦他作耶？

src_original: etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṃ mayā parakṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「苦他作者，此亦無記。 」迦葉復問：

src_original: NidSa 20.9c kin nu bho gautama svayaṃkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「苦自、他作耶？

src_original: etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṃ mayā svayaṃkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「苦自、他作，此亦無記。 」迦葉復問：

src_original: NidSa 20.9d kin nu bho gautama asvayaṃkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「云何——瞿曇！ ——苦非自非他、無因作耶？

src_original: etad api kāśyapa avyākṛtaṃ mayā asvayaṃkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「苦非自非他、無因作者，此亦無記。 」迦葉復問：

src_original: NidSa 20.10 kin nu bho gautama svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham iti pṛṣṭo 'vyākṛtam iti vadasi
tgt_original: 「瞿曇！ 所問苦自作耶？ 答言無記。

src_original: parakṛtaṃ svayaṃkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca asvayaṃkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṃ duḥkham iti pṛṣṭo 'vyākṛtam iti vadasi /
tgt_original: 他作耶？ 自、他作耶？ 非自非他、無因作耶？ 答言無記。

src_original: kin nu bho gautama nāsty eva duḥkham /
tgt_original: 今無此苦耶？ 」佛告迦葉：

src_original: NidSa 20.11 na kāśyapa nāsty eva duḥkham iti tv asty eva duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「非無此苦，然有此苦。 」迦葉白佛言： 「善哉！

src_original: NidSa 20.12 sādhu me bhavān gautamas tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jāneyaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyeyam /
tgt_original: 瞿曇！ 說有此苦，為我說法，令我知苦見苦。

src_original: NidSa 20.13a sā eva kāśyapa vedanā sa vettīti yasyaivaṃ syāt svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham  evam ahaṃ na vadāmi /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「若受即自受者，我應說苦自作；
